info.name: Digg Dark Gray
info.description: A dark gray version for Digg.com. only the colors were changed, the layouts in terms of size, padding and so on remain unchanged, so you'll still have that original Digg feel. Digg Reader and Digg Store are excluded.
info.additionalInfo: Update: (March 3, 2016) - Fixed aesthetics for the new profile page. - Added two icons to match the profile page. - Color fix for user notice. - Button hover fix for profile information. Update: (January 30, 2016) [ View on Imgur ] - Color change for bottom navigation's border when window is small. - Adjusted height of bottom navigation to fit the icons. Update: (January 25, 2016) [ View on Imgur ] - Fixed styling of footer navigation when window is small. - Fixed the headline color of the first story when window is small. - Note: This fix is basically for Smartphone screens, since Digg is a responsive design. You can view it though by just re-sizing your window to be very small. Update: (January 21, 2016) [ View on Imgur ] - Fixed comments/twitter feed in Digg Live to match the aesthetics of the style. - Fixed the story headline in Digg Live - Note: Decided to leave the comments themselves with a white background, to differentiate. Credits: - Flaticon.com for the inline images.
